title: Volume Reset after ever update... has to stop
body:
Is it just me or does every time LoL update, it max's our volume and blows my ears out... I mean its a small thing, but then agin... after a long time, it gets old. Can this be dealt with or is it set to be like this every time?

 The sounds and all are great, i do like the music, just not to to max level.

Any one else?

replies.body:
Is it your client settings volume or your OS?  There could be a settings corruption not syncin'g your settings configuration correctly.  See if a config reset might help there:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
I have done what u said above and the sound is normal for most of the part, but will have to wait for next patch update to see if it really does the trick, thanks
